text.title: Escondido
text.p:
Escondido
is a city in
North
San Diego
County
in
Southern California
.

p.s:
Escondido is located 30 miles north of
San Diego
on I-15 , and 20 miles east/inland of
Oceanside
on State Route 78 .
The nearest major airport is the San Diego International Airport in San Diego .

The nearest general aviation airport is Palomar Airport in
Carlsbad
.

The
North County Transit District ( NCTD )
operates bus routes throughout northern San Diego County , as well as the
Sprinter
, a new light rail line running along Route 78 between Escondido and Oceanside .
Buses and the Sprinter train calls at , located at 700 W Valley Pkwy .

North Shore Lake Hodges Trail
.
A 0.6-mile trail which runs along Interstate 15 , beginning at Sunset Drive ( Escondido ) , and is an excellent and moderate hiking , biking , and equestrian trail .
For mountain bikers , there is a trail that continues west .

EscoGelato
, 122 South Kalmia , ☏ +1760 745-6500 .
8AM-9PM weekdays , 9AM-9PM weekends .
A locally owned gelato shop just off Grand Ave. in downtown Escondido .
Ingredients are often locally sourced from the weekly Escondido farmers ' market .
In addition to gelato , the location also serves salads , paninis , baked goods , coffee , and other beverages .
Gelato cakes and catering are available as well .

Holiday Wine Cellar
, 302 W Mission Ave , ☏ +1760 745-1200 .
Has an extensive collection of wine , beer , and liquor .
Weekend afternoon and weekday evening tasting events are frequently hosted in the downstairs cellar bar ( a retro space accessible by a spiral , red carpeted staircase ) .
This local business also operates an online retailer .

Stone Brewing Company
, 1999 Citricado Parkway , ☏ +1760 471-4999 .
The Escondido location is Stone Brewing Company 's headquarters .
Stone brews a variety of regular and seasonal beers , with a particular strength in IPAs ; its most famous beer is " Arrogant Bastard , " an American Strong Ale , but Stone brewery has an expansive .
For visitors , the brewery has a company store and an extensive restaurant and beer garden .
Growlers and growler fills , including many limited special release beers , are available in the company store .
Brewery tours are offered several times daily , which end in a beer tasting .
